name: Candy Catcher
overview: Catch Candy however you have to beware the robot that comes and tries to hit you! Here is how scoring is going to work: You catch a piece of candy : + 10 points You jump and crush the robot : + 15 points You miss a piece of candy and it hits the ground : - 1 point You get hit by a piece of candy : - 5 points The robot grabs a piece of candy : - 10 points (Basically random luck on the robots part but forces you to take more challenging moves!) The robot hits you = Game Over.
